item.description:
Iran had produced some wonderful films in the past decade or so and "Stray Dogs" does not seem an exception. Two children long to be with their parents in post-Taliban Afghanistan. Only catch is that both parents are inprisoned and so the kids decide to go on a crime spree! After botching a few times, they are told to watch US movies to learn how to steal and to watch European movies to learn how to be caught! Along the way they befriend a dog who looks a bit like Benji.

Here's a review:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/...

After the movie, I'll be holding a Meet-Up sign near the front row.
item.name: Stray Dogs: Children Steal to Join Inprisoned Parents
